price: Basi wakajirudi nafsi zao, wakasema: Hakika nyinyi mlikuwa madhaalimu!
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: Wakazirejea nafsi zao wakiifikiria ile ibada yao kuabudu vitu visivyo mnufaisha yeyote wala haviwezi kujitetea wenyewe. Wakayaona makosa yao. Baadhi yao wakasema: Ibrahim si katika walio dhulumu, bali nyinyi ndio madhaalimu kwa kuabudu vitu visio stahiki kuabudiwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
